<i class='icon-flag-checkered'></i> Crui.desc:
Classic vehicle display, music, great food, shopping, contests, and loads of fun! Sponsored by NDS.
When: August 1, 5-8pm

<i class='icon-music'></i> The Brighter.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, Blues performers The Brighter Side will be performing at 7:30PM on Friday, August 2 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change funds will be donated to: Youth Action Fund
August 1 2, 4:30-7:00 at Hodges

<i class='icon-music'></i> Polka &amp; C.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, On Wednesday, August 7 The Chardon Polka Band will be performing at 11:30PM and then Everyday America featuring Amanda Jones & Sugarland Tribute Band will be performing at 7:30pm at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

<i class='icon-leaf'></i> Farmers Market.desc: There will be a farmers market in downtown on Wednesday from 2 to 6. Fresh produce from local vendors, baked goods, jams, jellies, honey, syrup, flowers, health information & screening, cooking & vegetable carving demonstrations, gardening tips, kid's day, free market bag & shopper incentives. Fun for the whole family!

<i class='icon-music'></i> Ruby Shooz.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, 50s & 60s style performers Ruby Shooz will be performing at 7:30PM on Friday, August 9 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

<i class='icon-music'></i> Todd Taylor.desc: As a part of the Lake Anna Concert Series, 50s & 60s style performers Todd Taylor will be performing at 11:30am on Wednesday, August 14 at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo

<i class='icon-leaf'></i> Downtown Farme.desc: There will be a farmers market in downtown on Wednesday from 2 to 6. Fresh produce from local vendors, baked goods, jams, jellies, honey, syrup, flowers, health information & screening, cooking & vegetable carving demonstrations, gardening tips, kid's day, free market bag & shopper incentives. Fun for the whole family!

<i class='icon-certificate'></i> Firewor.desc: After the concert, there will be fireworks at Lake Anna Park at 9:30pm on Sunday, September 1.

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Offices C.desc: City offices will be closed September 2 in observance of Labor Day.
